message: The REL_CAL_POLICY field for indicator 10-4-2, translated into en
data: A biannual update to the SDG database will be made by the custodians, but it is expected that most countries will have updated indicators only every five years or so, given the underlying source data collection calendars. The WBG would be the custodian of any international agreement committing individual countries to an update schedule. Existing CEQ Assessments listed here: commitmentoequity.org/publications-ceqworkingpapers/
